name: System Information Government and Institutional
description: aplikasi internal untuk Bank Mandiri. Tujuannya adalah untuk mempermudah pemeliharaan dan pelacakan transaksi serta alur kerja. Aplikasi ini juga memiliki fitur visualisasi data untuk membantu merumuskan strategi berdasarkan data transaksi.

name: Wholesale Alliance Information System
description: Internal application for Bank Syariah Indonesia. The purpose is make their transaction and operational data easier to maintain and generate its analytics report immediately.

name: Single Dashboard
description: Internal application for Bank Syariah Indonesia, that can turn any of their existing data, which is in excel formats, into visualisation. That way they can make their report faster.

name: Wildpeonies
description: e-commerce website for singapore brand. The purpose is to sell their clothes, dress, etc and provide a platform for their customers to buy their products.

name: TLCA Architects
description: Landing page for TLCA Architects. The purpose is to showcase their work and provide a platform for their clients to view their portfolio.
